enum.name: hidden
enum.help: Make the object hidden. (Like it wasn't there at all)

enum.name: clickable
enum.help: Make the object clickable by the input devices

enum.name: click_focusable
enum.help: Add focused state to the object when clicked

enum.name: checkable
enum.help: Toggle checked state when the object is clicked

enum.name: scrollable
enum.help: Make the object scrollable

enum.name: scroll_elastic
enum.help: Allow scrolling inside but with slower speed

enum.name: scroll_momentum
enum.help: Make the object scroll further when 'thrown'

enum.name: scroll_one
enum.help: Allow scrolling only one snappable children

enum.name: scroll_chain_hor
enum.help: Allow propagating the horizontal scroll to a parent

enum.name: scroll_chain_ver
enum.help: Allow propagating the vertical scroll to a parent

enum.name: scroll_chain
enum.help: SCROLL_CHAIN_HOR and SCROLL_CHAIN_VER

enum.name: scroll_on_focus
enum.help: Automatically scroll object to make it visible when focused

enum.name: scroll_with_arrow
enum.help: Allow scrolling the focused object with arrow keys

enum.name: snappable
enum.help: If scroll snap is enabled on the parent it can snap to this object

enum.name: press_lock
enum.help: Keep the object pressed even if the press slid from the object

enum.name: event_bubble
enum.help: Propagate the events to the parent too

enum.name: gesture_bubble
enum.help: Propagate the gestures to the parent

enum.name: event_trickle
enum.help: Send events to children first

enum.name: state_trickle
enum.help: Propagate state changes to children

enum.name: adv_hittest
enum.help: Allow performing more accurate hit (click) test. E.g. consider rounded corners.

enum.name: ignore_layout
enum.help: Make the object not positioned by the layouts

enum.name: floating
enum.help: Do not scroll the object when the parent scrolls and ignore layout

enum.name: send_draw_task_events
enum.help: Send `LV_EVENT_DRAW_TASK_ADDED` events

enum.name: overflow_visible
enum.help: Do not clip the children to the parent's ext draw size

enum.name: flex_in_new_track
enum.help: Start a new flex track on this item

enum.name: layout_1
enum.help: Custom flag, free to use by layouts

enum.name: layout_2
enum.help: Custom flag, free to use by layouts

enum.name: widget_1
enum.help: Custom flag, free to use by widget

enum.name: widget_2
enum.help: Custom flag, free to use by widget

enum.name: user_1
enum.help: Custom flag, free to use by user

enum.name: user_2
enum.help: Custom flag, free to use by user

enum.name: user_3
enum.help: Custom flag, free to use by user

enum.name: user_4
enum.help: Custom flag, free to use by user

element.name: style
element.help: Add a style to the widget

arg.name: selector
arg.help: Target part and state, can be ORed, e.g. pressed|knob

element.name: remove_style
element.help: Remove a style from the widget

arg.name: selector
arg.help: Target part and state, can be ORed, e.g. pressed|knob

element.name: remove_style_all
element.help: Remove all styles

element.name: bind_style
element.help: Bind a style to a subject value

element.name: event_cb
element.help: Attach an event callback

arg.name: user_data
arg.help: Optional user data as a string

element.name: screen_load_event
element.help: Load another screen on event

element.name: screen_create_event
element.help: Create + load a new screen on event

element.name: play_timeline_event
element.help: Play a timeline on event

element.name: subject_toggle_event
element.help: Toggle an int subject's value on an a trigger

element.name: subject_set_int_event
element.help: Set a subject (int) on event

element.name: subject_set_float_event
element.help: Set subject (float) on event

element.name: subject_set_string_event
element.help: Set subject (string) on event

element.name: bind_flag_if_eq
element.help: Enable flag if subject's value is is equal to a reference value

element.name: bind_flag_if_not_eq
element.help: Enable flag if subject's value is not equal to a reference value

element.name: bind_flag_if_gt
element.help: Enable flag if subject's value is graeter than a reference value

element.name: bind_flag_if_ge
element.help: Enable flag if subject's value is greater than or equal to a reference value

element.name: bind_flag_if_lt
element.help: Enable flag if subject's value is less than value

element.name: bind_flag_if_le
element.help: Enable flag if subject's value is less than or equal to a reference value

element.name: bind_state_if_eq
element.help: Apply a state if subject's value is equal to a reference value

element.name: bind_state_if_not_eq
element.help: Apply a state if subject's value is not equal to a reference value

element.name: bind_state_if_gt
element.help: Apply a state if subject's value is greater than a reference value

element.name: bind_state_if_ge
element.help: Apply a state if subject's value is greater or equal to a reference value

element.name: bind_state_if_lt
element.help: Apply a state if subject's value is less than a reference value

element.name: bind_state_if_le
element.help: Apply a state if subject's value is less or equal to a reference value

prop.name: ext_click_area
prop.help: Extra clickable area around object in px

prop.name: style_pad_top
prop.help: Keep this distance on the top from the content inside

prop.name: style_pad_bottom
prop.help: Keep this distance on the bottom from the content inside

prop.name: style_pad_left
prop.help: Keep this distance on the left from the content inside

prop.name: style_pad_right
prop.help: Keep this distance on the right from the content inside

prop.name: style_pad_hor
prop.help: Set both left and right padding

prop.name: style_pad_ver
prop.help: Set both top and bottom padding

prop.name: style_pad_row
prop.help: Set padding between rows of layouts

prop.name: style_pad_column
prop.help: Set padding between columns of layouts

prop.name: style_margin_top
prop.help: Keep distance above the widget when used in a layout

prop.name: style_margin_bottom
prop.help: Keep distance below the widget when used in a layout

prop.name: style_margin_left
prop.help: Keep distance to the left of the widget when used in a layout

prop.name: style_margin_right
prop.help: Keep distance to the right of the widget when used in a layout

prop.name: style_margin_hor
prop.help: Set both left and right margin

prop.name: style_margin_ver
prop.help: Set both top and bottom margin

prop.name: style_radial_offset
prop.help: Set radial offset (e.g. on ticks of circular scales)

prop.name: style_shadow_spread
prop.help: Assume that the base rectangle is larger by this

prop.name: style_flex_flow
prop.help: Set how flex should flow the children (row, column, etc)

prop.name: style_flex_main_place
prop.help: Set main axis align (horizontal with flex_flow=row)

prop.name: style_flex_cross_place
prop.help: Set cross axis align (vertical with flex_flow=row)

prop.name: style_flex_grow
prop.help: Set flex grow to fill the available space in the track

prop.name: style_grid_cell_column_span
prop.help: How many columns the cell should span

prop.name: style_grid_cell_x_align
prop.help: How to align the cell horizontally

prop.name: style_grid_cell_row_span
prop.help: How many rows the cell should span

prop.name: style_grid_cell_y_align
prop.help: How to align the cell vertically

prop.name: style_opa
prop.help: Scale down the opacity of the widget and all its children

prop.name: style_opa_layered
prop.help: Create a snapshot from the widget and blend it with opacity

prop.name: style_anim_duration
prop.help: Set animation duration in ms (e.g. for label scroll)

prop.name: style_transform_width
prop.help: Change the width without affecting the layouts

prop.name: style_transform_height
prop.help: Change the height without affecting the layouts

prop.name: style_translate_x
prop.help: Offset in X after the layouts are calculated

prop.name: style_translate_y
prop.help: Offset in Y after the layouts are calculated

prop.name: style_rotary_sensitivity
prop.help: Set rotary sensitivity for Crown input devices

prop.name: style_recolor
prop.help: Mix this color to the widget and all its children

prop.name: flex_grow
prop.help: Set flex grow to fill the available space in the track

prop.name: flex_flow
prop.help: Set flex flow direction (row, column, etc.)

prop.name: checked
prop.help: Mark widget as checked (e.g. switch or checkbox)

prop.name: focus_key
prop.help: Mark widget as focused via key navigation

prop.name: edited
prop.help: Mark widget as being edited (e.g. text input)

prop.name: hovered
prop.help: Mark widget as hovered by a pointer

prop.name: hidden
prop.help: Make the object hidden. (Like it wasn't there at all)

prop.name: clickable
prop.help: Make the object clickable by the input devices

prop.name: click_focusable
prop.help: Add focused state to the object when clicked

prop.name: checkable
prop.help: Toggle checked state when the object is clicked

prop.name: scroll_elastic
prop.help: Allow scrolling inside but with slower speed

prop.name: scroll_momentum
prop.help: Make the object scroll further when 'thrown'

prop.name: scroll_one
prop.help: Allow scrolling only one snappable children

prop.name: scroll_chain_hor
prop.help: Allow propagating the horizontal scroll to a parent

prop.name: scroll_chain_ver
prop.help: Allow propagating the vertical scroll to a parent

prop.name: scroll_on_focus
prop.help: Automatically scroll object to make it visible when focused

prop.name: scroll_with_arrow
prop.help: Allow scrolling the focused object with arrow keys

prop.name: snappable
prop.help: If scroll snap is enabled on the parent it can snap to this object

prop.name: press_lock
prop.help: Keep the object pressed even if the press slid from the object

prop.name: event_bubble
prop.help: Propagate the events to the parent too

prop.name: gesture_bubble
prop.help: Propagate the gestures to the parent

prop.name: adv_hittest
prop.help: Allow performing more accurate hit (click) test. E.g. consider rounded corners.

prop.name: ignore_layout
prop.help: Make the object not positioned by the layouts

prop.name: floating
prop.help: Do not scroll the object when the parent scrolls and ignore layout

prop.name: overflow_visible
prop.help: Do not clip the children to the parent's ext draw size

prop.name: flex_in_new_track
prop.help: Start a new flex track on this item

prop.name: bind_checked
prop.help: Bind widget’s checked state to a subject
